name: Hänsel Is Dead
description:
Do you remember the fairy tale "Hansel & Gretel"?

Two children are sent by their stepmother into the forest, nibble on a (probably crow sh*t infested) gingerbread house, are captured by an old, bony witch, finally manage to burn her and find through the forest...yes.  A nice children's fairy tale...but what if the story went diffrently?

Incredibly traumatized, Gretel flees through the forest. The darkness unsettles her and she seems to believe that Hansel is now chasing after her. The light of her torch keeps her sane...don't let it go out! Find five loaves of bread to feed the crows, so that they'll let you pass.

Controlls

Move: A and D; Left Stick (Gamepad)

Look: W and S; D-Pad

Jump: Space; South Button 

 Pause: ESC; Start

Features

Crying

Spoopy atmosphere

Full Controller Support

Two eastereggs

How to download

1. Download ZIP

2. Unpack

3. Start .exe

4. Enjoy the spoop!

Credits

Tilda by Chaxs

Ninji by Ninsn

Sounds by Epidemic Sounds
